profile.description:
I am a Computer Systems Engineer waiting for my degree, although I have not yet had formal experience, I have successfully completed my professional residency.
I am a person who likes challenges and stay productive so that during
my stay at the institute I participated in extracurricular activities, such as courses, contests, certifications, clubs and hackathons.

experience.first-job-description: AZ-900 Certification is an opportunity to demonstrate knowledge of cloud concepts, Azure services, Azure workloads, security and privacy in Azure, as well as Azure pricing and support. Candidates should be familiar with general technology concepts, including networking, storage, computing, application support, and application development.
experience.second-job-title: Professional Residency: Registration and control system for beneficiaries and support granted by the Municipal Presidency of Nuevo Ideal, Dgo.
experience.second-job-description: Development of a web application through which to keep a record of the beneficiaries and support granted, in order to keep track of them
experience.last-job-title: Hackathon: ZENCON Mexico Edition - Blockchain Hackathon Award
